venue.name: Enterprise Center at Salem State College

item.description:
Mobile Marketing 2012
Thursday, June 21, 8:30 to 10:30 AM FREE
  Your customers are increasingly interacting with the web and their peers using smart phones, iPads and other mobile devices. How can you leverage this to drive traffic to your business, increase word of mouth marketing, and influence customer behavior? Together we will determine how your business can benefit from mobile marketing. 

This is Co-Sponsored by the MA Small Business Development Center

You must registr here: https://mobilemarketing0621.eventbrite.com/?nomo=1

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Mobile Marketing 2012
